member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileStream.BeginDownload
member.summary: Begins downloading all or part of the font file.
member.param: Array of structures, each specifying a byte range to download.
Number of elements in the fileFragments array. This can be zero to just download file information, such as the size.

Receives an object that can be used to wait for the asynchronous download to complete and to get the download result upon completion. The result may be NULL if the download completes synchronously. For example, this can happen if method determines that the requested data is already local.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileStream.GetFileFragmentLocality
member.summary: Returns information about the locality of a byte range (i.e., font fragment) within the font file stream.
member.param: Offset of the fragment from the beginning of the font file.
Size of the fragment in bytes.
Receives TRUE if the first byte of the fragment is local, FALSE if not.
Receives the number of contiguous bytes from the start of the fragment that have the same locality as the first byte.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileStream.GetLocalFileSize
member.summary: GetLocalFileSize returns the number of bytes of the font file that are currently local, which should always be less than or equal to the full file size returned by . If the locality is remote, the return value is zero. If the file is fully local, the return value must be the same as .
member.param: Receives the local size of the file.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileStream.GetLocality
member.summary: Gets the current locality of the file.
member.returns: Returns the current locality (i.e., remote, partial, or local).

member.name: IDWriteRemoteFontFileStream
member.summary: Represents a font file stream, parts of which may be non-local. Non-local data must be downloaded before it can be accessed using ReadFragment. The interface exposes methods to download font data and query the locality of font data.
